p: D.J. Clauw has performed consulting for Pfizer, Tonix, Samumed, Lilly, and Aptinyx, and has received research funding from Aptinyx. S.P. Cohen is supported by a grant from the U.S. Dept. of Defense, Uniformed Services University, Department of Physical Medicine & Rehabilitation, Musculoskeletal Injury Rehabilitation Research for Operational Readiness (MIRROR) (HU00011920011). The remaining authors have no conflicts of interest to declare.
